summary: Cannabis is a plant with many uses and a long history. It belongs to the Cannabaceae family and has different species, but scientists aren't sure about the exact number. People often call it hemp, especially when used for practical purposes like making ropes or extracting oil from its seeds. Cannabis is native to Asia and has been used for various reasons, including medicine and recreation. The plant contains a chemical called THC, which makes people feel high when consumed. Different strains have varying amounts of THC.
title: Cannabis
